ch0297_00_volo/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t know if
I’d see you today!
ch0297_00_volo/0101_0701_02_10:
If you ever find yourself in need of something, I’ll
happily provide it—for a fee, of course.
ch0297_00_volo/7101_0701_01_10:
If you ever want to learn about Hisuian history,
then I’m your man!
ch0297_00_volo/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ve spent plenty of time studying such things
instead of—
ch0297_00_volo/7101_0701_03_10:
Ahem, I mean while also tirelessly doing my work
for the Ginkgo Guild. And I’ve visited many of the
ruins in the Hisui region!
ch0297_00_volo/7102_0701_01_10:
Curiosity and a hunger for knowledge are what
drive people to grow and improve... Don’t you
agree?
ch0297_00_volo/7102_0701_02_10:
The culture here on Pasio—or rather, here in the
future—has advanced so far beyond what we had
in Hisui.
ch0297_00_volo/7102_0701_03_10:
Ever striving for greater heights, gaining
undiscovered knowledge... That is humanity’s true
nature!
ch0297_00_volo/7103_0701_01_10:
Do you have a moment? I’ve got a real bargain
for—
ch0297_00_volo/7103_0701_02_10:
What? You don’t want it? You think I’m
suspicious somehow?
ch0297_00_volo/7103_0701_03_10:
Oh, have some mercy! Can’t you see I’m dying to
tell you about it?
ch0297_00_volo/7104_0701_01_10:
Surely you understand the sense of elation
experienced when unraveling the shrouds of
mystery surrounding history and legends!
ch0297_00_volo/7104_0701_02_10:
Said legends and history allow us to more deeply
understand our world—they are the best things in
life!
ch0297_00_volo/7105_0701_01_10:
You have a magnetic quality that draws in
everyone around you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I wonder if you were born with it.
ch0297_00_volo/7105_0701_02_10: Not everyone has such a talent.
ch0297_00_volo/7105_0701_03_10:
Perhaps you are special—like you’re some kind of
chosen one!
ch0297_00_volo/1701_0701_01_10:
Here you go! I’m giving these to my most loyal
customers!
ch0297_00_volo/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s on the house—just this once! I won’t be
collecting any payment!
ch0297_00_volo/2501_0701_01_10:
Ever since I was young, whenever I’ve met with
something painful or heartbreak...
ch0297_00_volo/2501_0701_02_10:
I couldn’t help but wonder why life was so unfair.
Why I was cursed to live through such things.
ch0297_00_volo/2501_0701_03_10:
Of course, I imagine we all go through something
like that... What about you?
ch0297_00_volo/2501_0702_01_10:
Eventually, I chose to direct all my energy into my
own natural curiosity and ambition.
ch0297_00_volo/2501_0702_02_10:
And what tickled my curiosity more strongly than
anything were the mysteries to be found in
legends, in history, in ruins.
ch0297_00_volo/2501_0702_03_10:
You see, I fancied that by unraveling these
mysteries, I could find out how the world itself
came to be...
ch0297_00_volo/2501_0702_04_10:
and with that knowledge, maybe even forge a
new, better world!
ch0297_00_volo/2511_0701_01_10:
Someone who wields Pokémon and someone who
battles alongside theirs are two completely
different things.
ch0297_00_volo/2511_0701_03_10:
You will walk alongside your Pokémon and
seize whatever dreams you have.
ch0297_00_volo/2511_0702_01_10:
To be a sync pair is to share both joy and
sadness...
ch0297_00_volo/2511_0702_02_10:
To be the kind of person who follows their dreams
with their Pokemon by their side, I suppose...
ch0297_00_volo/2511_0702_03_10:
It makes me wonder what sorts of stories Pasio’s
sync pairs have in store for me.
ch0297_00_volo/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Are you heading out today? In that
case, Potions are a must!
ch0297_00_volo/3003_0701_01_10:
The weather outside is lovely today! So how
about it? Care to go on an outing with me?
ch0297_00_volo/3005_0701_01_10:
Please, don’t overexert yourself too late at night.
I don’t want to lose one of my loyal customers!
